description:
Powerful HTTP toolbelt, in one intuitive app
Free and open source on Mac, Windows, and Linux
## Features
* Create HTTP requests.
* View entire transaction.
* Organize everything.
* Never repeat yourself.
* Love the experience.

## Insomnia Addons
Enhance the power of the app.
* Plus
* Teams

summary: Debug APIs like a human, not a robot. Finally, a REST client you'll love. For 64bit only.
author: Floating Keyboard Software
